Text: Transpecos Cc Dave Using the numbers we have today and the Pemex volume of day as we have noted does not get KM to where we would want to be I layered on an additional year commitment on the day to cover some of the gap but we were still short of targets I then modified the debt term to years which should be acceptable as the project would be supported for that length by the extended term and that covers an additional portion of the gap However we are still short of our target and my calculations indicate a need to have day starting in year and lasting through year to make up the difference In the alternative a rate of with the year term and year debt note also gets us there All in all neither one is that big of a hill to climb so we know what we are looking at Mark Could you review from TWs perspective and see if you come up with numbers in the same ball park Robert Proffitt Business Development Natural Gas Pipeline Co Phone Fax
